attributes.action: make it unlawful for MPs to profit from taxpayers money and to lead by honest credible example
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not want my/our tax money being used to pay for MPs to furnish their homes and provide their children with trusts with tax payers money,  claiming expenses without receipts for every penny, MPs personal gardening, insurance etc.  Any 2nd home in London should be an apartment leased through the public puse and kept in the public domain when released.  Everything should be  verified as essential  by an independent auditor and available to the public whom these MPs supposed to serve. As everyone else in the country has to do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
